article: Almost all the students at school in China are learning a foreign language . And millions of adults  are learning a certain foreign language, too. How  _  the adults do it? Some people try to learn  _  at home; others go to evening classes. If they use the language only  two or three times  a week, the learning will take a long time, like us students learning a language  at school . A few  _  try to learn a language fast by  studying six or more hours a day. However, most people can't afford  this, and for  many  people it is not necessary . They need the language in order to  do their work  _ . Whether  the language is learnt quickly or slowly, it is hard  _ . Machines and good books will  _ , but they can't do the student's job  _  them.
